title: Bonus Mystery skin
body: Hi, I purchased 20 mystery skins during event time, and when I login today, I only got one bonus skin (Captain GP)~~~~is the gift all out? Is this count as one too???

replies.body: o ok><~~~thankyou very much , I was counting the gp skin for, hopefully I get the good ones on my mystery ><~

The mystery gifts for the buy 6 get 1 promotion haven't been distributed yet.  They should start going out this week. They want to have them all out by the end of the week. 

Mysticman89 is right, you got the Captain GP skin for playing a game with him during the Bilgewater event. :D

Captain gangplank was separate from the mystery gift stuff, and was given for playing one matchmade game with gangplank during the bilgewater event.

The mystery gift rewards probably haven't been handed out yet.
